price: o dumaklot Siya sa kanila habang nasa paggala-gala nila kaya hindi sila mga makalulusot,
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
